Posts.Content:
Hi b0bbi I've known several women withnthe same thing you have and they were benign. I know it's very scary and I understand about
 not going to a doctor in many years. I, too, am not fond of drs, but I force myself to have my checkups. I have to have my mammo too, as it's been a few years. Take care, smile, and be glad you have a supportive husband,,,it's very important. Let us know how you make out with your test.
Posts.Title: I am so scared
